overview: Dr. Ali Ghalambor is a renowned name in the field of oil and gas production and research. He has worked with prestigious universities and organizations like the United Nations. Recently, he was appointed as general chairperson for the 2012 SPE International Symposium and Exhibition on Formation Damage Control.

milestones.description: Offshore Pipelines, co-written by Ali Ghalambor, has proven to be one of the most useful references for engineers and developers who are accorded the challenging task of bringing oil and gas onshore.
The Frac-Packing Handbook, co-authored by Dr. Ali Ghalambor, can be an industry technical personnelâ€™s guide in increasing revenues.
Dr. Ali Ghalambor blog:  Textbooks pave the way for students toward a complete mastery of their chosen field, ultimately helping them to reach the cusp of success.
